pkgmetadata.longdescription: PyEnchant is a set of language bindings and some wrapper classes to make the excellent Enchant spellchecker available as a Python module. The bindings are generated using SWIG. It includes all the functionality of Enchant with the flexibility of Python and a nice 'Pythonic' object-oriented interface. It also aims to provide some higher-level functionality than is available in the C API.
